welcome: Welcome to the world's most up-to-date address book.
verify.header: Verify your phone and email by entering the codes that were sent to you.
createAccount.header: Welcome to Resplice! We see you are new here so we just need your full name to get you started. Optionally add a picture of yourself to make it easier for others to recognize you.

errors.PHONE: Invalid phone number. Please enter a valid phone number.
errors.EMAIL: Invalid email. Please enter a valid email address.
errors.VERIFICATION_CODE: Incorrect verification code, please double check your code and try again.
errors.INVALID_INPUT: One or many fields are invalid. Please try again.
errors.botDetected: We detected some bot behavior, you must be a robot?
errors.UNRECOGNIZED: Unknown Error. Please try again later.
